meanings.definition: A performance involving synchronized swimming and diving.
meanings.sent1: The aquacades at the pool were mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent2: The synchronized swimmers put on an impressive aquacades show.
meanings.sent3: The aquacades performance had the audience cheering with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her graceful movements in the aquacades were like a dance in water.
meanings.sent5: The aquacades created a beautiful harmony between swimmers and divers.

meanings.definition: The art of performing water-based stunts and tricks.
meanings.sent1: He practiced aquacades every day to perfect his skills.
meanings.sent2: The circus performer amazed the crowd with his aquacades expertise.
meanings.sent3: The aquacades artist made the audience gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: Her aquacades skills were as impressive as a magician's tricks.
meanings.sent5: Watching the aquacades was like witnessing a water ballet of talent.

meanings.definition: A show or display of water-based entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The aquacades at the theme park drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent2: The resort's nightly aquacades were a highlight of the vacation.
meanings.sent3: The aquacades performance made everyone smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: The aquacades show was a splash of fun in the water.
